T02TD2244E:124b-1: sam kshipta she ka pra kri ya /
T02TD2244E:125a-1: dbang gi bya ba mdor bsdus pa /
T02TD2244E:125a-2: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag tshal lo //
T02TD2244E:125a-3: thub pa'i sku ni bde chen po //
T02TD2244E:125a-4: thog ma med par rtag shar ba'i //
T02TD2244E:125a-5: lhan cig skyes dka' phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD2244E:125a-6: dbang gi chog gsal bar bshad //
T02TD2244E:125a-7: de la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur zhing gnang ba thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum la mkhas shing /
T02TD2244E:125a-8: bzlas pa rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2244E:125a-9: rang gi slob ma legs par brtags pa rjes su gzung bar 'dod pas rgyal po dang rkun ma la sogs pa'i nye bar 'tsho ba rnams dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa la sogs par cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bris pa'i rngul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram /
T02TD2244E:125a-10: thang ka'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la lnga yis mchod de /
T02TD2244E:125a-11: dgongs ka'i dus su bum pa lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:125a-15: gcig la rdo rje sems dpa' dang ;
T02TD2244E:125a-20: gti mug dang zhe sdang dang 'dod chags dang /
T02TD2244E:125a-21: rdo rje dga' ma rnams dang /
T02TD2244E:125a-27: chos kyi rdo rje rnams dang /
T02TD2244E:125a-31: bgegs mthar byed rnams kyi go rims ji lta bar thub pa'i mtshan ma bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2244E:125a-32: sna tshogs rdo rje dang rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga ga dengs pa dang /
T02TD2244E:125a-33: 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa dang /
T02TD2244E:125a-34: nor bu ma rka ta cha dgu pa dang /
T02TD2244E:125a-37: mig 'bras sngon po'i spyan dkar po zung dang /
T02TD2244E:125a-38: rdo rje nag po rtse lnga pa dang /
T02TD2244E:125a-39: yal ga dang bcas pa'i padma dang /
T02TD2244E:125a-42: dri za'i pi wang sngon po dang /
T02TD2244E:125a-44: ro'i lhung bzed dmar po dang /
T02TD2244E:125a-47: rdo rje tho ba nag po dang /
T02TD2244E:125a-50: rdo rje sngon po gdengs pa'o //
T02TD2244E:125a-53: lha mo bcu ni sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la'o //
T02TD2244E:125a-54: lhag ma rnams ni sna tshogs padma dang /
T02TD2244E:125b-0: nyi ma'i gdan la gnas @125b ba'o ;
T02TD2244E:125b-1: / las thams cad pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa' 'am /
T02TD2244E:125b-2: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2244E:125b-3: de la rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni mchu yo ba med pa rtsa ba nag po med pa /
T02TD2244E:125b-6: mtshan ma legs par bris pa /
T02TD2244E:125b-7: gos gtsang mas mgrin pa dkris pa /
T02TD2244E:125b-8: bu ta ta ba ba la sogs pas kha brgyan pa /
T02TD2244E:125b-20: shve ta aa pa ra dzi ta dang /
T02TD2244E:125b-25: sman lnga bum pa'i nang du blugs la /
T02TD2244E:125b-26: dri'i chus yongs su bkang ste /
T02TD2244E:125b-28: mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul te /
T02TD2244E:125b-29: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi zhu ba'i gzugs su gzhug go / de'i rjes la me tog gi phreng bas nye bar mjes pa'i rdo rje steng du yang dag par bzhag ste /
T02TD2244E:125b-30: rang rig lhag pa'i lha'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dam //
T02TD2244E:125b-31: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags so //
T02TD2244E:125b-32: bum pa gzhan rnams ni ji lta ba'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02TD2244E:125b-34: me tog dang sbos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod pa dang /
T02TD2244E:125b-36: mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje che //
T02TD2244E:125b-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstod /
T02TD2244E:125b-38: dri sngon du 'gro bas dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2244E:125b-39: bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2244E:125b-40: de'i rjes la rdo rje slob mas mandala byas la /
T02TD2244E:125b-41: me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pas pus mo'i lha ngas la bzhag ste /
T02TD2244E:125b-42: sngags kyi theg pa'i skal pa dang ldan pa la /
T02TD2244E:125b-43: sngags kyi dngos grub gnyer ba gang /
T02TD2244E:125b-46: gzhan du 'jig rten pha rol gnyer //
T02TD2244E:125b-47: 'jig rten pha rol la dmigs te//
T02TD2244E:125b-48: slar yang dad pa ldan pa yis //
T02TD2244E:125b-52: de bzhin pha rol don du ni //
T02TD2244E:125b-53: 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer na //
T02TD2244E:126a-1: slob ma blos rang gi lus la bcug ste /
T02TD2244E:126a-2: rdo rje nas phyung nas rang gi gsang ba'i rig ma'i padma'i nang du gnas pa la de bzhin gshegs pa zhu bas dbang bskur bar bltas te /
T02TD2244E:126a-3: dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi sgor nye bar gnas par gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:126a-4: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa ni //
T02TD2244E:126a-5: m'a ma k'i dang lhan cig sbyor //
T02TD2244E:126a-6: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2244E:126a-7: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa'i //
T02TD2244E:126a-8: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02TD2244E:126a-9: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2244E:126a-10: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te /
T02TD2244E:126a-11: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol ;
T02TD2244E:126a-12: / thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2244E:126a-13: mgon pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02TD2244E:126a-15: slob ma'i gtso bo gcig gis bya'o //
T02TD2244E:126a-16: bu tshur theg pa chen po la //
T02TD2244E:126a-17: gsang sngags spyod pa'i cho ga'i tshul //
T02TD2244E:126a-18: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya /
T02TD2244E:126a-19: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te//
T02TD2244E:126a-20: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02TD2244E:126a-21: dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD2244E:126a-22: rdo rje dbang bskur mthu stobs kyis //
T02TD2244E:126a-23: ye shes mnyam pa nyid thob pa //
T02TD2244E:126a-24: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med pas /
T02TD2244E:126a-25: sh'akya seng ge mchog sogs kyis //
T02TD2244E:126a-26: drag po chen po bdud kyi sde //
T02TD2244E:126a-27: stobs chen dag kyang des bcom nas //
T02TD2244E:126a-28: 'jig rten mthun par gshegs nas kyang //
T02TD2244E:126a-30: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2244E:126a-31: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / ces brjod la /
T02TD2244E:126a-32: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02TD2244E:126a-33: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02TD2244E:126a-34: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02TD2244E:126a-35: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung /
T02TD2244E:126a-36: zhes pas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshig su bcad pa slob mas bklag par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:126a-37: aom aa beghn'anta kri h'um zhes pas bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis bsrung ngo //
T02TD2244E:126a-38: de dag gis snying ga dang /
T02TD2244E:126a-40: spyi bo la zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD2244E:126a-44: de la lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis 'dzin pa lags te /
T02TD2244E:126a-45: slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams kyi snying ga dang /
T02TD2244E:126b-0: @126b h'um a'a: aom zhes brjod pa ste /
T02TD2244E:126b-1: me tog ni mgo bo la'o //
T02TD2244E:126b-3: de bzhin du dri dang mar me ni snying gar sbyin no //
T02TD2244E:126b-4: de'i rjes su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags mngon par bzlas pa'i ma gas pa dang /
T02TD2244E:126b-5: 'bus ma zos ba'i aa shvdtha'i shing la sogs pa sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad la /
T02TD2244E:126b-6: rtse mor me tog gi phreng bas bcings pa'i so shing slob ma dag la sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:126b-7: de dag gis kyang rtse mo kha shar ram byang du bltas pas bca' bar bya'o //
T02TD2244E:126b-8: ba lang gi pags pa tsam byugs pa'i sa la dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2244E:126b-9: de la zhi ba la sogs pa'i las bstan te /
T02TD2244E:126b-10: gang la mngon par phyogs lhung pa //
T02TD2244E:126b-11: de yi dngos grub mchog tu shes //
T02TD2244E:126b-12: de yang shar phyogs rtse mo ni //
T02TD2244E:126b-14: byang du bltas dang de bzhin logs //
T02TD2244E:126b-15: 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub bzhed //
T02TD2244E:126b-16: gal te lho ru mngon phyogs pas //
T02TD2244E:126b-17: shin tu drag po de nas 'gyur ;
T02TD2244E:126b-18: / nub tu mngon par kha bltas pa //
T02TD2244E:126b-19: phra mo'i dngos grub ba de la yod //
T02TD2244E:126b-20: de bzhin du ni shing ngor //
T02TD2244E:126b-23: nges par 'di la dpyad pa med //
T02TD2244E:126b-24: de'i rjes su thor 'thung dri'i chu khyor pa gsum gyi btung ba ;
T02TD2244E:126b-25: aom hri: bi shuddha sarba dharma sarba p'a pa ni rts'a sya sam sho dha ya pi kalpa aa pa na ya h'um //
T02TD2244E:126b-26: zhes pa 'di'i sngags kyis kha bkru bar bya'o //
T02TD2244E:126b-27: de ltar nye bar gtad de ku sha la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags te /
T02TD2244E:126b-28: de dag stan dang sngas su sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:126b-29: nges mngon par bsngags pa'i skud pa sum sgril mdud pa gsum byas la bsrung ba'i don du dbung pa g-yas par bcing bar bya'o chos ston pa brjod de /
T02TD2244E:126b-30: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag / au dumw'a ra'i tog bzhin //
T02TD2244E:126b-31: brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung srid ;
T02TD2244E:126b-32: / gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba //
T02TD2244E:126b-33: de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste //
T02TD2244E:126b-34: gang gis mnyam med sems can don //
T02TD2244E:126b-35: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02TD2244E:126b-36: bskal pa bye ba du ma ru //
T02TD2244E:126b-37: sngon du sdig pa byas pa gang //
T02TD2244E:127a-0: dkyil 'khor 'di ni mthong ma thag / de ma thag zad 'gyur @127a * //
T02TD2244E:127a-2: gang gis spyod pa mchog 'di la //
T02TD2244E:127a-3: blo gros shin tu dri med na //
T02TD2244E:127a-4: sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung ba yi //
T02TD2244E:127a-6: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
T02TD2244E:127a-7: rnyed pa bla med de ring rnyed //
T02TD2244E:127a-8: gang gis khyod rnams rgyal ba kun //
T02TD2244E:127a-9: sras bcas 'di yis bstan pa la //
T02TD2244E:127a-10: thams cad kyis ni yongs 'dzin pa'i //
T02TD2244E:127a-12: de phyir khyed rnams theg chen du //
T02TD2244E:127a-14: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02TD2244E:127a-15: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02TD2244E:127a-16: khyed rnams der ni dong bas na //
T02TD2244E:127a-17: 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
T02TD2244E:127a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2244E:127a-19: zhes pa'i chos ston pa rnams mnyan par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:127a-20: de ltar bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis yang dag par bsrungs te /
T02TD2244E:127a-21: sdom pa'i khyad par yongs su gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2244E:127a-22: 'khor lo mi ldog pa yi dbang //
T02TD2244E:127a-23: mgon po de dag bdag la stsol //
T02TD2244E:127a-24: 'khor lo lha yi de nyid dang //
T02TD2244E:127a-25: slob dpon gyi ni las dang yang /
T02TD2244E:127a-26: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig rnams //
T02TD2244E:127a-27: gsang pa yi ni sdom pa mchog / slob dpon chen po rtag tu ni //
T02TD2244E:127a-28: sems can kun gyi don bya'o //
T02TD2244E:127a-29: de nas slob ma ku sha bkram pa la nyal bar bya'o //
T02TD2244E:127a-30: gang cung zad rmi lam du mthong ba nang pa rang la sgrogs shig ces brjod do //
T02TD2244E:127a-31: slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2244E:127a-32: slar dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs te /
T02TD2244E:127a-33: slob dpon gyis bsrung ba'i don du bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyi bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:127a-35: tho rangs kyi cho slob ma rnams bkug ste /
T02TD2244E:127a-36: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rmi lam blta'o //
T02TD2244E:127a-37: gal te slob mas mi dge ba'i rmi lam mthong na /
T02TD2244E:127a-38: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis yang dag par bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2244E:127a-39: de'i rjes su bris pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen po 'di mchod bar byas la rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro bas //
T02TD2244E:127a-40: rang gi slob ma'i cho ga bzhin du rang 'jug go //
T02TD2244E:127a-41: 'jug pa ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2244E:127a-42: dbang la thug pa'i bar du bcom ldan 'das bdag po las blos thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2244E:127b-0: de nas sla ba rnams gzhug par @127b bya ba'i phyir ba dan pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:127b-1: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD2244E:127b-2: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2244E:127b-3: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD2244E:127b-4: rgyu las de bzhin yang dag 'byung //
T02TD2244E:127b-5: de bzhin de nyid nges par 'byung //
T02TD2244E:127b-7: gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma rnams //
T02TD2244E:127b-8: dri med thams cad thob par shog / ces pa la sogs pa brjod pas //
T02TD2244E:127b-9: yol ba'i phyi rol du slob mas yon phul te /
T02TD2244E:127b-10: slob ma dbang bskur ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su dmigs pa la /
T02TD2244E:127b-11: a'a kham b'i ra h'um zhes pa'i sngags brjod cing me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD2244E:127b-12: gdod g-yogs bcings te bum pa'i chos bsangs te dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i phyir dri bar bya'o //
T02TD2244E:127b-13: bu khyod cu la dga' zhes pa'i //
T02TD2244E:127b-14: des kyang brjod par bya ba ni //
T02TD2244E:127b-15: bde chen skal bzang bdag lags so zhes 'gyur ro //
T02TD2244E:127b-16: slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje yang dag par bzhag la /
T02TD2244E:127b-17: aom badzra yo ga tsitta au p'a da ya mi /
T02TD2244E:127b-18: aom su ra te sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2244E:127b-19: bo dhi tsitta badzra ya th'a su kham zhes pas byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:127b-20: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyin gyis rlob par 'gyur gyis /
T02TD2244E:127b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog 'di khyod kyis dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la smra bar mi bya zhing //
T02TD2244E:127b-22: ma dad pa rnams la yang ma yin no //
T02TD2244E:127b-23: aom a'a dza: h'um zhes pa 'dis bkug ste /
T02TD2244E:127b-24: yol ba'i nang du bcug la /
T02TD2244E:127b-25: dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi sgor yang dag par bzhag la /
T02TD2244E:127b-26: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2244E:127b-27: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis /
T02TD2244E:127b-28: ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na /
T02TD2244E:127b-29: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02TD2244E:127b-30: 'di lta bu'i ye shes ngas khyod la bskyed par bya yis /
T02TD2244E:127b-31: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2244E:127b-32: khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
T02TD2244E:127b-33: slar mgo bor rdo rje yang dag par bzhag ste /
T02TD2244E:127b-35: dga' pa khyod kyis 'di smras nas //
T02TD2244E:127b-36: dam tshig rdo rje 'di yis ni //
T02TD2244E:128a-2: me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje yang dag par snying gar bzhag ste /
T02TD2244E:128a-4: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2244E:128a-5: snying la yang dag zhugs pa ni //
T02TD2244E:128a-6: gal te tshul 'di smras gyur na //
T02TD2244E:128a-7: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD2244E:128a-8: 'dis ni mna' bsgag par bya ste //
T02TD2244E:128a-9: bdud rtsi lnga padma'i snod du yang dag par bzhag ste /
T02TD2244E:128a-10: yi ge gsum gyis yang dag par byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2244E:128a-11: aom badzra a'a mri tod ka tha zhes lan gsum gyi bar du 'di bzlas te /
T02TD2244E:128a-12: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD2244E:128a-13: dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed //
T02TD2244E:128a-14: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub thob //
T02TD2244E:128a-15: 'thungs shig rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu //
T02TD2244E:128a-16: zhes bklags pa ni dam tshig go //
T02TD2244E:128a-17: de nas 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2244E:128a-18: deng phan chad khyod kyis phyag na rdo rje yin gyis //
T02TD2244E:128a-19: ngas ci gyis shig ces bsgo ba de khyod kyis bya dgos la /
T02TD2244E:128a-20: nga la brnyas par yang ma byed cig / byas na yang ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi chu sbyin pa'o //
T02TD2244E:128a-21: de nas slob mas 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD2244E:128a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag la byang chub kyi sems phob cig ces bya'o //
T02TD2244E:128a-23: de nas slob ma'i snying gar lam ser po las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa /
T02TD2244E:128a-24: sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um do //
T02TD2244E:128a-25: spyi bor bam las byung ba'i bum pas mtshan pa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po la gnas pa'i yi ge ha'o //
T02TD2244E:128a-26: mgrin par yam las skyes pa'i g-yo ba'i ba dan gyis mtshan ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs la gnas pa'i yi ge aa'o //
T02TD2244E:128a-27: rkyang pa'i 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor la 'bar ba ram gyi yi ge las skyes pa'i ka dog dmar po rdo rjes mtshan pa /
T02TD2244E:128a-28: 'od zer 'phro ba me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa la gnas pa'i dzheem gi yi ge 'od zer dang bcas pa bsam la /
T02TD2244E:128a-29: bsnyems tshul dang bcas pa'i dril bu dkrol par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:128a-30: a'a be sha ya stvam bha ya ra ra tsa la ya tsa la ya h'um ha aa dzheem zhes brjod do //
T02TD2244E:128a-31: lce la yi ge aa dmar po bsgom /
T02TD2244E:128a-32: 'od dpag med kyi gzugs su bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:128a-33: phebs par gyur na smros shig bu yis dge me dge //
T02TD2244E:128b-1: tishtha badzra zhes brjod pas brtan par bya ste /
T02TD2244E:128b-2: mig dag la ci snang zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02TD2244E:128b-3: de nas des dmar po dang /
T02TD2244E:128b-9: mngon spyod rnams grub pa'i snad du 'gyur ro zhes brjod do ;
T02TD2244E:128b-10: / bden pa'i byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:128b-12: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya /
T02TD2244E:128b-13: lha rnams kyi ni rigs ji bzhin //
T02TD2244E:128b-14: 'ji ltar bsod nams de bzhin shog /'di yis dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur //
T02TD2244E:128b-15: rigs ni gang gis grub pa dang //
T02TD2244E:128b-17: dkyil 'khor 'dir ni de bzhin shog / de nas me tog gi phreng ba dkyil 'khor du pra t'i tstsha ba dzra ho zhes pa 'dis dor ro //
T02TD2244E:128b-18: de nas me tog ltung bas dman pa dang /
T02TD2244E:128b-19: 'bring dang mchog gi dngos grub mtshon par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:128b-20: de la gal te sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbu 'am /
T02TD2244E:128b-22: gtsug tor la lhung na phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ster ro //
T02TD2244E:128b-23: mchog gi yan lag las ni mchog go //
T02TD2244E:128b-24: 'bring gi yan lag las ni 'bring ngo //
T02TD2244E:128b-25: mtha' ma'i yan lag las ni mtha'o //
T02TD2244E:128b-26: gzugs brnyan dang ring ba las ni shin tu yun ring ba na'o //
T02TD2244E:128b-27: nye ba las ni myur ba'i dngos grub po //
T02TD2244E:128b-28: lha rnams kyi rigs ni re'u mig las sogs pa rnam par bcad pa las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:128b-29: gal te lha gnyis po'i bar dag tu lhung na /
T02TD2244E:128b-30: de yang gang gi nye ba de'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
T02TD2244E:128b-31: dkyil 'khor gyi pha rol du lhung na dman pa'i dngos grub bo ;
T02TD2244E:128b-32: / gal te reg la lhung na slar 'phang ngo //
T02TD2244E:128b-33: lan gsum bar du de nyid la lhung na dngos grub med do //
T02TD2244E:128b-34: rdo rje ra ba'i phyi rol du lhung na dngos grub med do //
T02TD2244E:128b-35: snying ga la lhung ba shin tu dka'o zhes pa ni me tog dor ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2244E:128b-36: de nas phreng ba bzung ba mgo la bcing ba ni //
T02TD2244E:128b-37: sems can stobs chen khyod kyis ni //
T02TD2244E:128b-38: 'di ni rab tu gzung par gyis //
T02TD2244E:128b-40: mig gnyis la yang yi ge aom bltas te /
T02TD2244E:128b-41: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2244E:128b-42: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02TD2244E:128b-44: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02TD2244E:129a-1: brjod la mig ras bsal bar bya'o //
T02TD2244E:129a-2: de nas skyil 'khor nye bar bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:129a-3: dbus kyi rnam shes phung po ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD2244E:129a-4: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su ni gzugs rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2244E:129a-5: tshor ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02TD2244E:129a-6: 'du shes ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o//
T02TD2244E:129a-7: 'du byed ni don yod grub pa'o me la sogs pa mtshams rnams su ni spyan ma'o //
T02TD2244E:129a-8: chu'i khams ni m'a ma ka'i'o //
T02TD2244E:129a-11: dkyil 'khor pha rol gyi me la sogs pa'i mtshams su shar gyi ngos gnyis su gzugs rdo rje dang /
T02TD2244E:129a-16: chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje rnams so //
T02TD2244E:129a-20: bgegs mthar byed rnams shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su gnas pa'o //
T02TD2244E:129a-22: yid ches pa'i dbang brjod par bya ste ;
T02TD2244E:129a-23: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD2244E:129a-24: mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba ltar //
T02TD2244E:129a-25: bdag la drang ba'i don gyi phyir /
T02TD2244E:129a-26: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02TD2244E:129a-27: zhes gsol ba 'debs pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma mi bskyod pa'i gzugs su dmigs la /
T02TD2244E:129a-28: rig pa'i skyes bu dang bcas pa'i chu rnams thams cad kyi bum pa'i chu blugs bar bya'o //
T02TD2244E:129a-29: h'um las rdo rjer bltas te /
T02TD2244E:129a-30: rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu stobs kyis rdo rje dang bcas khu tshur gyis bum pa'i chu blugs te /
T02TD2244E:129a-31: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02TD2244E:129a-32: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas la //
T02TD2244E:129a-33: gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung //
T02TD2244E:129a-34: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02TD2244E:129a-35: aom badzra aa bhi shinyts'a mi stvam zhes brjod pas /
T02TD2244E:129a-36: slob ma 'khor los sgyur ba lta bu la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2244E:129a-37: chu'i dbang gi cho me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02TD2244E:129a-38: de nas bstan ma thag pa'i rim pas gser ram gos la sogs pa las byas pa'i cod ban slob ma la byin te /
T02TD2244E:129a-39: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sbyor ba ste /
T02TD2244E:129a-40: sangs rgyas kun gyis dkyil 'khor mchod //
T02TD2244E:129a-41: ma h'a mu ku tam pra t'itstsha badzra ho //
T02TD2244E:129b-0: zhes brjod pas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du son pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang gi rigs can gyi cod pan du rnam par @129b bsam mo zhes pa ni cod pan gyi dbang gi cho ga'o //
T02TD2244E:129b-1: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02TD2244E:129b-2: de nas rdo rje rtse lnga ba chen po snying gar lag pas bzhag / slob ma 'jig rten dbang phyug tu byas pa la /
T02TD2244E:129b-3: rdo rje legs pa g-yas su gtad par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:129b-4: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD2244E:129b-5: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02TD2244E:129b-6: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02TD2244E:129b-7: rab tu bsgrub phyir rdo rje thung //
T02TD2244E:129b-8: zhes brjod pas rdo rje snying ga la sogs par reg pas //
T02TD2244E:129b-9: rdo rje lag pa g-yas par sbyin par bya'o zhes pa ni rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2244E:129b-10: de nas don yod grub pa'i gzugs su dmigs la /
T02TD2244E:129b-11: lag pa g-yon par dril bu sbyin te /
T02TD2244E:129b-12: rdo rje dang dril bu dang ldan pa'i slob ma'i lag pa dag mngon par 'khyud pa'i tshul gyis lag par byin la /
T02TD2244E:129b-13: aom badzra a'a dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa m'i tishtha badzra sam ya stvam zhes brjod de zhes pa ni dril bu'i dbang gi cho ga'o //
T02TD2244E:129b-14: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so //
T02TD2244E:129b-15: de nas rnam par snang mdzad du bltas la ming gi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2244E:129b-16: mgor rdo rje dang dril bu mnyam par gzhag ste /
T02TD2244E:129b-17: aom badzra stva stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02TD2244E:129b-18: kye dpal gti mug rdo rje /
T02TD2244E:129b-20: kye dpal phrag dog rdo rje /
T02TD2244E:129b-21: kye dpal zhe sdang rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa rigs kyi rjes su mthun pa'i ming bya'o zhes pa ni ming gi dbang gi cho ga'o //
T02TD2244E:129b-22: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2244E:129b-23: dbang bskur ba 'di rnams kyis rgyud mnyan pa dang /
T02TD2244E:129b-25: sngags sgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2244E:129b-26: dbang po lnga po 'di dag nyid rig pa'i dbang zhes brjod de /
T02TD2244E:129b-27: thams cad la spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyi bya ba 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2244E:129b-29: rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2244E:129b-30: bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2244E:129b-31: thugs rje can gyi bka' drin gyis //
T02TD2244E:129b-32: de ring bdag la stsal du gsol //
T02TD2244E:129b-33: de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa steng du gdugs dang bla res brgyan pa shar gyi sgor seng ge'i khri la gnas pa rnam //
T02TD2244E:130a-0: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs la yi ge h'am las rdo rjer bltas @130a * //
T02TD2244E:130a-2: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2244E:130a-3: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD2244E:130a-4: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD2244E:130a-5: rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag / bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o zhes bya bas de nyid blangs ngo //
T02TD2244E:130a-6: de'i rjes su yi ge aa las skyes pa'i dril bu'o //
T02TD2244E:130a-7: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02TD2244E:130a-8: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02TD2244E:130a-9: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad //
T02TD2244E:130a-10: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //
T02TD2244E:130a-11: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis gnyis med byas //
T02TD2244E:130a-12: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2244E:130a-13: srid pa dam pa byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2244E:130a-14: zhes brjod pas slob mas dkrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2244E:130a-16: yid kyi lus ni brtan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2244E:130a-17: phyag rgya dam tshig ces brjod do //
T02TD2244E:130a-19: yid kyis lus ni brtan pa gang //
T02TD2244E:130a-20: de phyir phyag rgyar rab tu grags //
T02TD2244E:130a-21: zhes pa 'dis rang gi 'dod pa'i lhar dmigs la bdag nyid phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs la khong du chud par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:130a-22: de'i rjes su slob dpon rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las yang dag par byung ba'i lha mo'i tshogs nam mkhar gnas pas dbang bskur bar yud tsa bsam mo //
T02TD2244E:130a-23: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che//
T02TD2244E:130a-24: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02TD2244E:130a-25: gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung //
T02TD2244E:130a-26: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02TD2244E:130a-29: shes rab bcu drug lon pa la //
T02TD2244E:130a-30: lag pa gnyis kyis 'khyud nas ni //
T02TD2244E:130a-31: rdo rje dril bu rab sbyar ba //
T02TD2244E:130a-32: slob dpon gyi ni dbang du bzhed //
T02TD2244E:130a-34: de'i rjes su mdor bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD2244E:130a-35: dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dag pa bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:130a-37: yid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog / khang bu brtsegs pa ye shes so //
T02TD2244E:130a-38: sems ni gzhal yas khang gi dngos //
T02TD2244E:130a-39: phung po lnga la mnyam bsten nas //
T02TD2244E:130a-40: sangs rgyas lngar ni yongs su grags //
T02TD2244E:130a-42: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs par dmigs pa'i slob ma la rjes su gnang ba sbyin te /
T02TD2244E:130a-43: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2244E:130b-0: 'jig rten @130b khams ni thams cad du //
T02TD2244E:130b-1: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2244E:130b-2: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2244E:130b-3: zhes pas chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang /
T02TD2244E:130b-7: tshigs su bcad pa'i rim pas rjes su gnang ba sbyin no //
T02TD2244E:130b-8: de'i rjes su mi bskyod pa'i gzugs su dmigs la /
T02TD2244E:130b-9: rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin te /
T02TD2244E:130b-10: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02TD2244E:130b-11: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas //
T02TD2244E:130b-12: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad //
T02TD2244E:130b-13: phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD2244E:130b-14: zhes pa 'dis yi ge h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje sbyin te /
T02TD2244E:130b-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha dhara ya mi /
T02TD2244E:130b-16: hi hi hi hi h'um zhes brjod do //
T02TD2244E:130b-17: slob mas rdo rje bzung ngo //
T02TD2244E:130b-18: rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o //
T02TD2244E:130b-19: de'i rjes la bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su dmigs la snying gar lag pa g-yon pas chos gos snying gar bzung ba'i tshul du byas la /
T02TD2244E:130b-20: g-yas pas mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgyas btab la /
T02TD2244E:130b-21: slob ma gang gi rigs de'i gzugs su dmigs par byas la /
T02TD2244E:130b-22: de la lung bstan par bya ba ni /
T02TD2244E:130b-23: aom de ring khyod la ngas lung bstan //
T02TD2244E:130b-24: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2244E:130b-25: srid pa shin tu dag pas na //
T02TD2244E:130b-26: srid dang ngan 'gro dag las bton //
T02TD2244E:130b-27: he ma h'a mu ka na ma ta th'a ga ta /
T02TD2244E:130b-29: bhur bhu ba sva zhes pas lung bstan pa gong gi tshigs su bcad pa dang phyag rgya 'di dag gis lung bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2244E:130b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2244E:130b-31: byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dan bcas pa thams cad dang dkyil 'khor pa mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to //
T02TD2244E:130b-32: 'di nyid shin tu phyag rgya'i mthus //
T02TD2244E:130b-33: 'dis sngags kyi stobs kyis dad par bya //
T02TD2244E:130b-36: de'i rjes su ma h'a sa ma ya h'um ha na ha na h'um h'um phat phat ces brjod pas dbugs dbyung bar bya ste /
T02TD2244E:130b-37: gsang chen mchog gi dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2244E:130b-38: bcug pa dang ni mthong ba yis //
T02TD2244E:130b-39: sdig pa kun las rnam grol te //
T02TD2244E:130b-40: de ring khyod ni bde bar gnas //
T02TD2244E:130b-41: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02TD2244E:130b-42: phyin chad 'chi ba yod min bas //
T02TD2244E:130b-43: srid ba shin tu dag pas na //
T02TD2244E:131a-2: rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2244E:131a-3: byang chub sems ni spang mi bya //
T02TD2244E:131a-4: gang zhig skyes pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD2244E:131a-5: sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med //
T02TD2244E:131a-6: dam pa'i chos ni mi spang zhing //
T02TD2244E:131a-7: nam yang spang bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2244E:131a-8: mi shes pa'am rmongs pa la //
T02TD2244E:131a-9: de ni bstan par mi bya'o //
T02TD2244E:131a-10: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2244E:131a-11: nam yang spang bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2244E:131a-12: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pas na //
T02TD2244E:131a-13: slob dpon nam yang smad mi bya //
T02TD2244E:131a-14: rang gi bdag nyid yongs btang nas //
T02TD2244E:131a-15: dka' thub kyis ni gdung mi bya //
T02TD2244E:131a-16: ji ltar bde bas bde ba gzung //
T02TD2244E:131a-18: de ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur //
T02TD2244E:131a-19: sngags dang rgyud rnams 'dzin gyur par //
T02TD2244E:131a-20: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD2244E:131a-21: lha rnams kyang ni bzhed pa yin //
T02TD2244E:131a-22: sems can rnams ni rjes gzung phyir //
T02TD2244E:131a-23: dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du ni //
T02TD2244E:131a-24: khyod kyis nan tan bzhin du bris //
T02TD2244E:131a-25: sgrub pa po rnams rgyud la sbyor //
T02TD2244E:131a-27: 'di la rjes su gnang ba sbyin te //
T02TD2244E:131a-28: rig pa'i dbang lnga'i rjes dang slob dpon gyi dbang gi rjes su sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:131a-29: slob dpon gyi dbang ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang zhes bya'o //
T02TD2244E:131a-30: thams cad la bum pa'i bya ba 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2244E:131a-31: dbang bskur ba 'di dag ni rgyun thams cad dang mi 'gal ba'o //
T02TD2244E:131a-32: 'di dag ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'i sku rdo rje rnam par spyod pa'o //
T02TD2244E:131a-33: da'i rjes la sgrib g-yogs la sogs pas dben par byas pa'i phyogs su slob ma dang yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang long tsho dang ldan pa //
T02TD2244E:131a-34: dam tshig dang sdom pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir bla ma la phul te /
T02TD2244E:131a-35: grol ba'i gnas skabs kyis gsol ba btab par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:131a-36: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD2244E:131a-37: mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba ltar //
T02TD2244E:131a-38: bdag kyang drang ba'i don gyi phyir //
T02TD2244E:131a-39: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02TD2244E:131a-40: bla mas kyang ting nge 'dzin gsum mngon du byas //
T02TD2244E:131a-41: rang rig par byas te nam mkha'i khams nas spros pa'i shes rab kyi padma nas blangs nas /
T02TD2244E:131a-42: shes rab gdong ni bcing ba dang //
T02TD2244E:131b-0: thabs kyis gdong yang de bzhin @131b no ;
T02TD2244E:131b-1: / rgan po dang ni ming med dag //
T02TD2244E:131b-2: gis ni slob ma'i khar lhung bya //
T02TD2244E:131b-3: aa ho ma h'a su kha zhes pas longs spyod kyi gnas su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:131b-4: rnam par snang mdzad bdag nyid do //
T02TD2244E:131b-5: de nas langs nas 'di dag nyid du sbyin no //
T02TD2244E:131b-6: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ni ngag gis rdo rje sbyong ba'o//
T02TD2244E:131b-7: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2244E:131b-8: de'i rjes su phyag rgya gcig gam /
T02TD2244E:131b-9: de las tha dad pa gzhan la so so rang gis rig pa'i chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i phyir gang sngar bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba 'debs pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma la de'i lag par de'i lag pa rab tu gtad do //
T02TD2244E:131b-10: lan cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rdo rje bzhag ste /
T02TD2244E:131b-11: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD2244E:131b-13: bsten par sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags //
T02TD2244E:131b-14: 'khor lo'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2244E:131b-15: dam pa'i bde ba nyams su myong //
T02TD2244E:131b-16: 'gro gsum de yis dag pa ni //
T02TD2244E:131b-17: thabs gzhan las ni byang chub med //
T02TD2244E:131b-18: de bas khyod kyis nam yang ni //
T02TD2244E:131b-20: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2244E:131b-21: rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med //
T02TD2244E:131b-23: de la mchog gi dngos grub med //
T02TD2244E:131b-25: des kyang gur gum dang tsandan dag byugs te dri zhim po dang me tog gi phreng bas mdzes par byas te /
T02TD2244E:131b-26: gos dang bral ba'i legs pa'i padma gsal bar bstan te /
T02TD2244E:131b-28: bshang gci la sogs bza' ba dang //
T02TD2244E:131b-29: khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha / bu khyod ci dgar spro gyur tam //
T02TD2244E:131b-30: bud med mchog la 'di bzhin gus //
T02TD2244E:131b-32: bu yi ji ltar bde ba smros //
T02TD2244E:131b-35: lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro //
T02TD2244E:131b-36: khu ba khrag sogs bza' ba dang //
T02TD2244E:131b-37: rtag tu bud med gus par byed //
T02TD2244E:131b-38: bha ga nyid la'o byed do //
T02TD2244E:131b-40: de nas dga' ba'i bsam pa dang brtse ba'i rnam par blta bas 'khyud bzhin du rnam par bltas te /
T02TD2244E:131b-44: bde ba thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02TD2244E:132a-2: da ni de yi mdun na gnas //
T02TD2244E:132a-3: ji ltar padma'i bya ba gyis //
T02TD2244E:132a-4: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur lhag / rang nyid bde chen rgyal po ste //
T02TD2244E:132a-5: 'di nyid du ni yang dag gnas //
T02TD2244E:132a-6: bhanydza h'um moksha ho zhes pa'o //
T02TD2244E:132a-7: des kyang rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid kyis /
T02TD2244E:132a-12: rkang pa rnams su go rims ji lta bar aom h'um sv'a a'a ha zhes pas rigs lnga yang dgod par byas la /
T02TD2244E:132a-13: de'i rjes su yi ge h'um las padma dang rdo rje a'a:dang yi ge aom dag gis ze'u 'bru dag gi nang du yi ge phat rnam par bsgom mo //
T02TD2244E:132a-14: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i rtsa g-yon gyi ngos na gnas pa sor mos bskyod de cung zad shes pas so //
T02TD2244E:132a-15: 'di yang bla ma'i man ngag las so //
T02TD2244E:132a-16: de'i rjes su aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes pas dga' ba brtsams par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:132a-17: rdo rje padmar rab bzhag nas //
T02TD2244E:132a-18: byang chub sems ni shor mi bya //
T02TD2244E:132a-19: dga' ba yis ni dkrugs pa yi //
T02TD2244E:132a-20: sems ni gang bas bsgom par bya //
T02TD2244E:132a-21: byang chub sems ni gshegs gsol pas //
T02TD2244E:132a-22: ji srid rnal 'byor pa mi byed //
T02TD2244E:132a-23: gang yang dga' ba las skyes 'di //
T02TD2244E:132a-25: byang chub sems ni lhung ba yis //
T02TD2244E:132a-26: phung po rnam shes brgyal gyur nas //
T02TD2244E:132a-27: ji srid dngos grub smad pa yin //
T02TD2244E:132a-28: mkha' dbyings rdo rje yang dag sbyor //
T02TD2244E:132a-29: reg pa las kyang rmad byung tshe //
T02TD2244E:132a-30: bde ba skye bar 'gyur ba gang //
T02TD2244E:132a-31: de ni mchog dga' dam pa'o ;
T02TD2244E:132a-32: / dga' bral gyi ni nang dag tu //
T02TD2244E:132a-33: mtshon zhing ltos la brtan par gyis //
T02TD2244E:132a-34: padma'i nam mkhar nor bu'i ze'u 'bru dag / rdo rje skyil mo krung gis mnan pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02TD2244E:132a-35: sems kyi nor bu'i nang du chud pa blta //
T02TD2244E:132a-36: ye shes gang skyes ye shes gzugs kyis brgyan //
T02TD2244E:132a-37: 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min //
T02TD2244E:132a-38: dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2244E:132a-39: rnal 'byor ye shes mthong ba gang //
T02TD2244E:132a-40: bde bar gnas pa 'pho ba med //
T02TD2244E:132a-41: thun phyed dam ni yang na gcig / nyin dang zla ba zla phyed lo //
T02TD2244E:132a-42: bskal pa bskal pa stong phrag tu //
T02TD2244E:132b-0: ye shes kyis ni rnal 'byor @132b gnas ;
T02TD2244E:132b-1: / slob mas snyoms par 'jug bltas la //
T02TD2244E:132b-3: gti mug dga' ma la sogs bzhi //
T02TD2244E:132b-4: de yis sems nyid la dgod do //
T02TD2244E:132b-5: slob ma'i mtshan nyid legs par gyis //
T02TD2244E:132b-7: de nas bcud kyis len gyi sems //
T02TD2244E:132b-8: byang chub mngon du 'gro bas blang //
T02TD2244E:132b-9: zhes pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2244E:132b-10: sems kyi rdo rje rnam par sbyong ba'o //
T02TD2244E:132b-11: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ji skad bshad pa'i cho gas shes rab kyi dbang yongs su 'dzin pa la de bzhin du mngon par brjod pa bzhi pa 'bras bur gyur pa'i dbang bskur ba rin po che brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2244E:132b-12: gzhan du dam tshig la sogs pas 'phags pa gsungs pa /
T02TD2244E:132b-13: gzhan du dbang ni ma bskur bar //
T02TD2244E:132b-15: nam mkha' khu tshur brdeg pa dang //
T02TD2244E:132b-16: smig rgyu'i chu la 'thung ba mtshungs //
T02TD2244E:132b-17: de'i phyir de kho na nyid kyi dbang cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byin pas slob ma'i mos pa la yid brtags te /
T02TD2244E:132b-18: zab cing rgya che ba la lhags bar mos na //
T02TD2244E:132b-19: tshig gis dbang bskur pa rin po che sbyin no //
T02TD2244E:132b-20: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02TD2244E:132b-21: 'o na ji ltar rang bzhin rgya che ba la mos par rigs she na /
T02TD2244E:132b-23: du ba las ni mer shes te //
T02TD2244E:132b-24: chu skyar las ni chu yin no //
T02TD2244E:132b-25: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis //
T02TD2244E:132b-26: rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes //
T02TD2244E:132b-27: bzhin ni rab tu dang bas ston //
T02TD2244E:132b-28: lus kyis kyang ni padma spro //
T02TD2244E:132b-29: khyod rgyas pa yis de nyid mthong ;
T02TD2244E:132b-30: gong de slob dpon mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2244E:132b-31: slob ma de ni rjes su gzung //
T02TD2244E:132b-35: dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa gsum //
T02TD2244E:132b-36: rgyud 'di ru ni rab tu grags //
T02TD2244E:132b-37: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang //
T02TD2244E:132b-38: de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yang //
T02TD2244E:132b-40: / dgod dang bltas dang lag bcangs dang //
T02TD2244E:132b-41: de ltar slar yang gnyis sprod rgyud //
T02TD2244E:132b-42: dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' dang //
T02TD2244E:132b-43: bral ba de bzhin lhan cig skyes //
T02TD2244E:132b-44: rnam pa sna tshogs rnam smin dang /
T02TD2244E:132b-45: rnam par nyid dang mtshan nyad bral //
T02TD2244E:132b-46: dbang bskur ba yi rim pa kun //
T02TD2244E:133a-1: cad shes rab lus las skyes //
T02TD2244E:133a-3: ae yi cha byad bzang po la //
T02TD2244E:133a-4: dbus su bam gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2244E:133a-5: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas //
T02TD2244E:133a-6: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / de la /
T02TD2244E:133a-7: dgod pa dag ni slob dpon te //
T02TD2244E:133a-8: lta ba de bzhin gsang ba'o //
T02TD2244E:133a-9: 'khyud ba dag la shes rab dang //
T02TD2244E:133a-10: bzhi pa de bzhin gnyis sprod rgyud //
T02TD2244E:133a-11: dga' ba cung zad bde ba ste //
T02TD2244E:133a-12: mchog tu dga' ba de bas lhag / dga' bral dga' ba chags bral 'gyur //
T02TD2244E:133a-13: lhan cig skyes dga' lhag ma'o //
T02TD2244E:133a-14: dang po rig pa 'dod pa ste //
T02TD2244E:133a-15: gnyis pa bde bar 'dod pa yin//
T02TD2244E:133a-17: de bas bzhi pa bsgom par bya //
T02TD2244E:133a-18: dga' ba dang po rnam sna tshogs //
T02TD2244E:133a-19: mchog tu dga' ba rnam par smin //
T02TD2244E:133a-20: dga' bral dga' ba rnam nyid dang //
T02TD2244E:133a-21: lhan cig skyes dga' mtshan nyid bral //
T02TD2244E:133a-22: rnam pa sna tshogs sna tshogs brjod//
T02TD2244E:133a-24: rnam par smin pa de las bzlog / bde ba'i ye shes za ba'o //
T02TD2244E:133a-25: rnam par nyed pa spyod par brjod //
T02TD2244E:133a-26: bdag gi bde ba spyod do zhes //
T02TD2244E:133a-27: mtshan bral dga' ba gsum las gzhan //
T02TD2244E:133a-28: chags dang chags bral rnam spangs pa'o //
T02TD2244E:133a-30: 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min //
T02TD2244E:133a-31: dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2244E:133a-32: dga' ba gsum po spong ba nyid //
T02TD2244E:133a-33: lhan cig skyes pa zhes brjod do //
T02TD2244E:133a-34: don 'di nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las bstan te /
T02TD2244E:133a-35: bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i yang dag sbyor //
T02TD2244E:133a-36: gang de bsnyen par zhes byar brjod //
T02TD2244E:133a-37: rdo rje padma mnyam par sbyor //
T02TD2244E:133a-38: nye bar sgrub pa zhes bshad do //
T02TD2244E:133a-39: bskyod pa rjod ba ru ni bshad //
T02TD2244E:133a-40: yi ge h'um phat mnyam par ldan //
T02TD2244E:133a-41: rang bzhin rang gi bde zhi ba //
T02TD2244E:133a-42: sgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do //
T02TD2244E:133a-43: bsgrub bya shes rab sgrub pa thabs //
T02TD2244E:133a-44: de dag sbyor ba bsnyen pa yin //
T02TD2244E:133a-45: padmar rdo rje 'jug pa nye bar sgrub //
T02TD2244E:133a-46: bskyod pa sgrub pa rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD2244E:133a-47: rang gi bde zhi sgrub pa chen por bshad //
T02TD2244E:133a-48: bsgrub bya sgrub par rdo rje gang //
T02TD2244E:133a-50: shin tu bskyod pa byang chub kyi //
T02TD2244E:133b-0: mthar @133b thug mchog tu dga' ba'o //
T02TD2244E:133b-1: 'phos pa yis ni dga' bral lo //
T02TD2244E:133b-2: 'di dag nang du gnas pa yis //
T02TD2244E:133b-3: bde ba bzhi par gang gsungs pa //
T02TD2244E:133b-4: de ni lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T02TD2244E:133b-5: sgrub pa shes pa'i don to //
T02TD2244E:133b-7: thog ma dbus dang tha ma med //
T02TD2244E:133b-8: srid med mya ngan 'das pa med //
T02TD2244E:133b-9: 'di ni bde chen mchog yin no //
T02TD2244E:133b-10: bdag dang gzhan yang yod ma yin //
T02TD2244E:133b-11: mchog gi srid par bshad pa ste //
T02TD2244E:133b-13: dga' ba gsum po tsam nyid ni //
T02TD2244E:133b-14: lhan skyes dga' ba rnam par spangs //
T02TD2244E:133b-15: sna tshogs spangs pa'i skad cig gis mchog tu dga' ba yang dag rnyed //
T02TD2244E:133b-16: bla mas bka' stsal sems dpa' che //
T02TD2244E:133b-17: bde ba chen po yang dag gzung //
T02TD2244E:133b-18: ji srid byang chub ma thob par //
T02TD2244E:133b-19: sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2244E:133b-22: gang phyir dbye bas gsum bstan pa //
T02TD2244E:133b-23: rgyu la 'bras bu gzhan med phyir //
T02TD2244E:133b-24: dbye ba gsum ni sngar rab grags //
T02TD2244E:133b-25: bral dang dga' ba nang dag tu //
T02TD2244E:133b-26: rab tu gsal bar byed pa bzhi //
T02TD2244E:133b-27: 'o na ji ltar yid dag nang du rab gsal zhes pa ji ltar zhe na /
T02TD2244E:133b-28: mchog gi mtha' la bral ba'i dbus //
T02TD2244E:133b-29: stong las stong min rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2244E:133b-30: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig go //
T02TD2244E:133b-31: stong las stong min ji ltar zhe na //
T02TD2244E:133b-32: thog ma tha ma med zhi ba //
T02TD2244E:133b-33: dngos dang dngos med khyab pa'i bdag / stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02TD2244E:133b-34: byang chub sems dpa' zhes byar brjod //
T02TD2244E:133b-35: ces pa ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
T02TD2244E:133b-36: 'di dag gang gis thabs kyis bskyed //
T02TD2244E:133b-37: dkyil 'khor la sogs thabs kyis dang //
T02TD2244E:133b-38: rang byin brlab pa'i rim pas kyang //
T02TD2244E:133b-39: zhes pa rgyas par sbyar ro //
T02TD2244E:133b-40: de dag bdag gis ni ma bshad do //
T02TD2244E:133b-42: gang rang rig pa'i ye shes 'di ni ngag gi spyod yul gyi lam las 'das pa'i phyir //
T02TD2244E:133b-43: byin rlabs goms pas gang de yi //
T02TD2244E:133b-44: thams cad shes pa de rang bzhin //
T02TD2244E:133b-46: gzhan du lhan cig skyes bshad med //
T02TD2244E:133b-47: gang las kyang ni rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02TD2244E:133b-48: bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pa las //
T02TD2244E:133b-49: rang gi bsod nams kyis shes 'gyur //
T02TD2244E:133b-50: bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis //
T02TD2244E:133b-51: rang gi bsod nams chen por 'gyur//
T02TD2244E:134a-0: @134a * // skad cig shes pa'i ye shes gang //
T02TD2244E:134a-1: ngag gi spyod yul lam las 'das //
T02TD2244E:134a-3: bde chen rgyal po gcig pa shes //
T02TD2244E:134a-4: 'gro ba'i rgyud la rtag shes par //
T02TD2244E:134a-5: gang gis kyang ni ston pa'i dus //
T02TD2244E:134a-6: thams cad mkhyen pa'ang tshig phongs 'gyur //
T02TD2244E:134a-7: sa ra pa yis gsungs pa /
T02TD2244E:134a-8: de'i tshig bla mas mi ston pas //
T02TD2244E:134a-9: slob mas go bar ma gyur te //
T02TD2244E:134a-10: grogs dag ma lus 'di dag lhan cig skyes pa yis //
T02TD2244E:134a-11: bdud rtsi'i ro 'gyur su zhig bstan //
T02TD2244E:134a-12: blo yi spyod yul ma yin dag gis rgyu ba med //
T02TD2244E:134a-13: bla ma'i brjod par dngos po las ring gtam las 'jug / de yang rim gyis snying rje la sogs rim gyis yon tan 'phel //
T02TD2244E:134a-14: dad ldan snying gi gnas su rang nyid ster bar 'gyur //
T02TD2244E:134a-15: 'o na byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid ci yin zer na /
T02TD2244E:134a-17: dbang po rnams ni gnyid log dang //
T02TD2244E:134a-18: yid ni nang du rnam gnas pa //
T02TD2244E:134a-19: sems ni nyams pa lta bur snang //
T02TD2244E:134a-20: lus ni dam pa'i bde pas rgyas //
T02TD2244E:134a-21: dbang po'i tshogs rnams rnam par nub //
T02TD2244E:134a-22: rnam par rtog nyams 'khor ba'i sa bon med //
T02TD2244E:134a-23: dga' ba'i snang ba 'di ni nam mkha' dang //
T02TD2244E:134a-24: mnyam pa'i ngo mtshar bsil ba'i nyams //
T02TD2244E:134a-25: dbang po rnams kyang nub 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2244E:134a-26: rang gi ngo bo yang nyams 'gyur //
T02TD2244E:134a-27: lhan cig skyes dga' mchog 'di ni /
T02TD2244E:134a-28: bla ma'i zhal la gsal bar dris //
T02TD2244E:134a-30: gang zhig nyams pa'i dus su shar bas 'dud //
T02TD2244E:134a-31: yul dang dbang po nyams par nu 'gyur ba //
T02TD2244E:134a-32: gang yang mngon dga' rgyal bas mdzes pa gcig pa'i lus //
T02TD2244E:134a-33: snying la myur du 'char ba mi ldog mkhas pa yin //
T02TD2244E:134a-34: rnam par rtog pa mtha' dag spangs pa'i blo //
T02TD2244E:134a-35: gang de bde ba dam pa'i stobs su 'gyur //
T02TD2244E:134a-36: de yang bya ba byas pa'i mkhas pa'o //
T02TD2244E:134a-37: gang gzhan phyugs ni rkang gnyis pa zhes pa'o ;
T02TD2244E:134a-38: / de'i phyir yang dag pa'i bla ma'i bsnyen bkur slob ma dam pas bya'o //
T02TD2244E:134a-39: sku gsum rjes su 'jug pa'i bde ba chen po'i ngo bo rang gis rig par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:134a-40: dbang bskur ba thob pa'i bya ba byas nas 'di skad brjod par bya ste //
T02TD2244E:134a-41: de ring bdag skyes 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD2244E:134b-0: @134b bdag gi rtsol ba 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD2244E:134b-1: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD2244E:134b-2: sangs rgyas sras su da gyur to //
T02TD2244E:134b-3: de nas bla ma dam pa dag la dbul //
T02TD2244E:134b-4: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs mtshan nyid //
T02TD2244E:134b-5: sna tshogs rgyan ni gos la sogs //
T02TD2244E:134b-6: rang gi lus ni khyad par 'phags //
T02TD2244E:134b-8: / de'i rjes su sbyin sreg byas te /
T02TD2244E:134b-9: gtor ma byin la skye bo 'du ba dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la chos ston de nas bya'o //
T02TD2244E:134b-10: sdug bsngal ba mgon med pa rnams tshim par bya'o //
T02TD2244E:134b-11: dbang gi cho ga mdor bsdus byas pa las //
T02TD2244E:134b-12: gang yang bsod nams las byung gzhal med pa ;
T02TD2244E:134b-13: / de yis gnyis med bsam mi khyab pa yi //
T02TD2244E:134b-14: bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid thob par shog / dbang gi cho ga mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2244E:134b-16: // / dpal gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa'o//
